Scissor-shaped phone case: Create a phone case that resembles a pair of scissors, complete with blades that can be used to cut paper or fabric.
Scissor-shaped pen: Design a pen that has a scissor-like tip, allowing users to write and cut with one tool.
Scissor-shaped ruler: Create a ruler that has scissor-like marks, allowing users to measure and cut with one tool.
Scissor-shaped bookmark: Design a bookmark that has scissor-like ends, allowing users to easily cut pages out of a book.
Scissor-shaped cookie cutter: Create a cookie cutter that resembles a pair of scissors, allowing users to cut out cookie shapes easily.
